subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After the Yankees’ victory Thursday in Baltimore, the official scorer at Camden Yards invoked a rule that allowed him to take the win away from an ineffective pitcher — here, Dave Robertson — and give it to another.
snippet: After the Yankees’ victory Thursday in Baltimore, the official scorer at Camden Yards invoked a rule that allowed him to take the win away from an ineffective pitcher — here, Dave Robertson — and give it to another.
